title: "Bot Artistry"
content: Bot Artistry is a sleek and modern website that showcases the beauty of AI-powered chatbots through abstract illustrations. Our minimalist color scheme allows the graphics to take center stage, highlighting the intricate details and advanced technology behind these innovative tools. Whether you're a tech enthusiast or simply appreciate art, Bot Artistry offers a unique perspective on the world of chatbots and their impact on our daily lives. Explore our gallery and discover the artistry of artificial intelligence.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract illustration of an AI-powered chatbot, with sleek and modern graphics and a minimalist color scheme."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
